imdb.plot outline: "Nominated" is a series composed of 10, five minute episodes produced exclusively for The Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Sciences and Walt Disney's Oscar.com. Hosted by Dave Karger, "Nominated" introduces Oscar fans to this year's biggest stories by profiling the best picture contenders. The best picture is awarded last for a reason; it's the most coveted prize and these acclaimed films embody this year's best performances, greatest technical achievements, and most memorable moments. These ten videos, filled with Dave Karger's film buff analysis, are the secret weapon to winning your Oscar pool! They'll kick start the Oscar conversation and motivate fans to regularly visit Oscar.com. This ten part video series debuts on February 1st and features a new video each day until February 10th. Each video examines one of the best picture nominees and provides exclusive access into the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.
imdb.title: Nominated with Dave Karger

production companies.name: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
